# Contributing guide

Simply write a (q)markdown file like this one and add the filename (e.g., `contributing.qmd`) to `_quarto.yml` under the field `book: chapters:`. 

For other advanced usages, refer to [Quarto documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/books/).
